bibl.title: I.C. CUNNINGHAM and A.D. KNOX, Theophrastus Characters, Herodas Mimes, Cercidas and the Choliambic Poets.
bibl.note: First published 1929. Second Edition 1993, with new text and translation of Theophrastus and Herodas.
bibl.seg: 364 Carmina varia Graeca Cercidas Herondas Hipponax Theophrastus
RUSTEN Jeffrey, I.C. CUNNINGHAM and A.D. KNOX (Edited and Translated by), Theophrastus Characters, Herodas Mimes, Cercidas and the Choliambic Poets. (The Loeb Classical Library. 225.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 1993, 8°, ix-574 pp. ISBN 0-674-99244-X. £10.50.
First published 1929. Second Edition 1993, with new text and translation of Theophrastus and Herodas.
